calendar.min_comment: Date minimale que l'utilisateur peut choisir
calendar.max_comment: Date maximum qui peut être choisie par l'utilisateur

checkboxes.choices_comment: Enter JSON key value pairs with the saved value and text displayed.

checkboxes.formatting_comment: Render the values as the display values

How to display values on the listing layouts.
You'll need to prepend the collection name

code.template_comment: Provide a template the user can use to get started with
code.language_comment: Définir le langage de programmation à utiliser
code.loc: No lines of {lang} | One line of {lang} | {count} lines of {lang}

collections.placeholder_comment: Texte statique s'affichant avant qu'une valeur soit sélectionnée
collections.include_system_comment: Inclure les collections système dans les options

color.format_comment: In what data format to save the value
color.palette_comment: Add color options as hex values
color.palette_only_comment: Only allow the user to pick from the palette

date.min_comment: Date minimale que l'utilisateur peut choisir
date.max_comment: Date maximum qui peut être choisie par l'utilisateur
date.localized_comment: Show the date localized in the output
date.relative_comment: Show the date relatively (eg 2 days ago)
date.icon_left_comment: Choose an optional icon to display on the left of the input
date.icon_right_comment: Choose an optional icon to display on the right of the input

datetime.min_comment: Minimum time that can be chosen by the user
datetime.max_comment: Maximum time that can be chosen by the user
datetime.localized_comment: Show the date localized in the output
datetime.relative_comment: Show the time relatively (eg 50 minutes ago)
datetime.icon_left_comment: Choose an optional icon to display on the left of the input
datetime.icon_right_comment: Choose an optional icon to display on the right of the input
datetime.utc_comment: Save to and display from UTC
datetime.default_to_current_datetime_comment: Sets the default value to current datetime
datetime.format_comment: The DateTime format to use for the input

datetime-created.relative_comment: Show the time relatively (eg 50 minutes ago)

datetime-updated.relative_comment: Show the time relatively (eg 50 minutes ago)

divider.style-comment: Change the style of the Divider
divider.margin-comment: Ajouter une marge supplémentaire au-dessus de l'interface

dropdown.choices_comment: Enter JSON key value pairs with the saved value and text displayed.

dropdown.allow_other_comment: Allow the user to add their own value

file.view_type_comment: Sélectionnez la façon dont vous souhaitez afficher les fichiers

file-size.format_comment: Afficher la valeur de manière lisible (par exemple 10MB)

file-size.decimal_comment: Afficher la valeur en nombre décimal (10Mo contre 10MiB)

files.allow_select_comment: Autoriser l'utilisateur de sélectionner un élément existant

map.map_lng_comment: Map will be centered at this longitude

map.max_zoom_comment: Maximum zoom allowed in the map
map.user_location_error_blocked: You've disabled the location access. Kindly enable it from the browser addressbar to auto detect your location.
map.user_location_error: There was an error while trying to get your location. Please try again.
map.address_to_code_comment: Add an input field to automatically get the geocodes from an address. Uses Nominatim. Please check their usage policy.
map.address_to_code_error: No geocode found for this address

markdown.tabbed_preview_comment: How to display the editor and preview
markdown.rows_comment: The starting number of text rows available

multiselect.choices_comment: Enter JSON key value pairs with the saved value and displayed text
multiselect.size_comment: Number of options visible before scrolling
multiselect.wrap_comment: Wrap the values with a pair of delimiters to allow strict searching for a single value

numeric.localized_comment: Localize the output to the user's locale

numeric.icon_right_comment: Choose an optional icon to display on the right of the input

password.hide_comment: Afficher des points pour les caractères saisis

preview.url_template_comment: A mustache template for a URL to preview content

radio-buttons.choices_comment: Enter JSON key value pairs with the saved value and text displayed.
radio-buttons.format_comment: The output format on the Browse Items page

repeater.template_comment: How to format value on the item browse display and inline preview
repeater.fields_comment: What fields to show in each repeated row
repeater.limit_comment: Maximum amount of rows the user can add
repeater.structure_comment: Whether to save the JSON as an array of objects or single object with unique keys
repeater.structure_key_comment: When using an object for the JSON structure, this value controls what field to use for the key values
repeater.placeholder_comment: The value that shows up instead of the template if there's no value entered yet
repeater.create_item_text_comment: Text that's displayed in the button that adds a new row to the repeater

slider.step_comment: Increments at which the value can be set
slider.unit_comment: Show an unit next to the slider value, e.g. 15 Pounds

slug.force_lowercase_comment: Makes sure the slug is in lowercase
slug.mirrored_field_comment: Keep the slug up to date with another (text) field

status.simple_badge_comment: Displays a colored dot on the item listing page.

tags.alphabetize_comment: Will rearrange tags to be alphabetical
tags.wrap_comment: Wrap the values with a pair of delimiters to allow strict searching for a single value
tags.format_comment: Convert the tags to Title Case when displaying the value
tags.sanitize_comment: Removes any non-alphanumeric characters and converts spaces to hyphens
tags.placeholder_text: Type a tag and then hit enter or comma...
tags.icon_left_comment: Choose an optional icon to display on the left of the input
tags.icon_right_comment: Choose an optional icon to display on the right of the input
tags.validation_comment: A RegEx to check each individual value against
tags.validation_message_comment: A short message to show users if tag validation fails

text-input.trim_comment: Trim surrounding whitespace from the value before saving
text-input.icon_left_comment: Choose an optional icon to display on the left of the input
text-input.icon_right_comment: Choose an optional icon to display on the right of the input
text-input.format_comment: Convert the value to title case

textarea.rows_comment: The number of text rows available for the input before scrolling

toggle.label_on_comment: Label to show next to the toggle when the toggle is on
toggle.label_off_comment: Label to show next to the toggle when the toggle is off
toggle.checkbox_comment: Display a checkbox instead of the default switch

toggle-icon.text-inactive-comment: Text next to the inactive icon
toggle-icon.text-active-comment: Text next to the active icon

translation.language_field_comment: The field that holds the language code in the related collection
translation.template_comment: Choose how to display values on the item layouts
